post.text: In Miami now - for a beautiful rally! Join me for a couple of minutes - we are going to MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Matthew
comment.text: You are the man for the job Mr. Trump, I appreciate the sacrifice you made to turn our country around and make America great again. I know you didn't want to do it, but I am so glad and thankful you did.

replies.author: Cody
replies.text: What sacrifices has he made? Of course he wanted to do. One he likes his name in lights two for history books three he's selfish and thinks he can make money out of it

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: He left his penthouse, his corporations, his family, he's using mostly his own money to fund his campaign. He was the first political figure to arrive on the scene during the recent flooding in Louisiana, giving toys to the children there who lost everything, and 100,000.00 to a Church near my aunt's home in Walker. He is non stop visiting those of our nation in distress. What hasn't he sacrificed ? would be the proper question.
